titleStmt.title: A panegyrick on the coronation of King James the II and His Royal Consort Queen Mary on April 23, 1685 / by the author of the plea for succession, in opposition to popular exclusion.
titleStmt.author: Basset, William, 1644-1695.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Basset by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
At head of title: Basilikon syggramma (Greek transliterated).
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
